Elis Regina's show at the 1979 Montreux Jazz Festival was full of polemics. First of all, she did not like her presentation. Second of all, there was a polemics with the great pianist Hermeto Pascoal who would have tried to show off. This CD shows all music which was recorded at the Festival what Elis Regina did not authorize at that time. This CD is a re-issue of a before released album (1982) but with 7 bonus tracks, simply those tracks Elis had not authorized in the 1982 issue. Cesar Camargo Mariano is brilliant as ever. Hermeto Pascoal plays on 3 piano-voice tracks with Elis, on "Corcovado", "Garota de Ipanema", and "Asa Branca". Despite all gossip, her renditions with Pascoal are great.
